name: Marble Warble
description:
Game made for Ludum Dare 48 .  This game was made in 72 hours

It’s Marble Warble! A game where you have to roll your ball to the bottom of the maze. Avoid falling off! Avoid the Angry Erics. Don’t avoid the time… seriously, you need those. Jump, pop, and zip around the board as you try and time each move perfectly! 

Controls Arrow keys to move 🤷‍♂️ - That’s it. It’s Marble Warble!
